text: The 2013 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards were held on June 14, 2013, at the Studio 8 in Kebon Jeruk, West Jakarta and hosted by Ayu Dewi and Coboy Junior. Coboy Junior and Ayu Dewi slimed at 2013 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards retrieved on 2013-06-15 The ceremony held the theme for "Slime Station". Coboy Junior led the nominations with two categories and also was biggest winner with taking home two awards for Favorite Child Star and Slime Star. ==Winners and nominees== Winners are listed on bold. List the winners of 2013 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards retrieved on 2013-06-14 {| class=wikitable style="width="100%" |- !Favorite Singer !Favorite Band |- | valign="top" | * Cakra Khan ** Agnes Monica ** Bunga Citra Lestari ** Vidi Aldiano | valign="top" | * Noah ** Ungu ** Vierratale ** Wali |- !Favorite Actress !Favorite Actor |- | valign="top" | * Reza Rahadian ** Dimas Anggara ** Dude Herlino ** Teuku Wisnu | valign="top" | * Citra Kirana ** Asmirandah ** Bunga Citra Lestari ** Nikita Willy |- !Favorite Cartoon !Favorite Comedian |- | valign="top" | * SpongeBob SquarePants ** Doraemon ** Naruto ** Upin & Ipin | valign="top" | * Komeng ** Andre Taulany ** Olga Syahputra ** Sule |- !Favorite Athlete !Favorite Boyband/Girlband |- | valign="top" | * Chris John ** Bambang Pamungkas ** Sergio van Dijk ** Taufik Hidayat | valign="top" | * JKT48 ** Cherrybelle ** Coboy Junior ** SM*SH |- !Favorite Child Star !Slime Star |- | valign="top"| * Coboy Junior ** Baim ** Cinta Kuya ** Nizam | valign="top"| * Coboy Junior |} ==References== Category:2013 film awards Category:2013 television awards Category:2013 music awards Category:2013 in Indonesian television
title: 2013 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards
